title: BBC Local Live: Lancashire on Tuesday 20 September 2016 - BBC News
summary: work is being carried out to protect a number of west lancashire council houses from flooding .
a cricket club near chorley , voted as having england 's most ground , could close due to lack of members .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from lancashire have finished for the day , but we will be back from 08:00 on wednesday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .
you can contact us via email , facebook or twitter .

documents.title: weather : cloudy with mist in rural areas
text: it will be a dry night , with some clear spells at first .
the cloud will thicken through the night , with a few pockets of mist reforming in rural spots .
temperatures overnight down to 10c .
more from bbc weather
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: latest headlines for lancashire
text: latest headlines for lancashire

documents.title: cricket : fears over club 's future
text: a cricket club once voted one of the most in the country is in danger of closing .
after 141 years , there are concerns white cop may have played their final game due to dwindling member numbers .
author: Paul O'Gorman
Reporter, BBC Radio Lancashire

documents.title: blackpool carer concerned over 'union plans ' for foster parents
text: a lancashire foster carer says he fears over the possible introduction of an employment law for carers would not necessarily be a good move .
a parliamentary meeting yesterday overwhelmingly voted in favour of unionising the fostering sector .

the event , chaired by shadow home secretary john mcdonnell , saw about 80 foster carers seeking what they call fairer working conditions , with the independent workers union of great britain calling the decision a `` monumental step forward '' .
but blackpool carer carl mitchell admits he has concerns .

documents.title: football : accrington 's beckles anticipating 'emotional ' west ham tie
text: accrington defender omar beckles has said tomorrow 's night 's efl cup tie against west ham will be `` emotional '' .
beckles ' father , linton , died in 2015 and was a west ham supporter .
the 24-year-old said his father - who was lead singer of 80s jazz-funk band central line - would have been proud to see him run out at the olympic stadium .
author: Dan Jewell
BBC Radio Lancashire Sport

documents.title: weather : turning cloudier during the afternoon
text: cloud will continue to build with temperatures close to normal .
it will be a dry night , with some clear spells at first .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: man who lost 22 stone 'refused nhs skin operation '
text: a man who lost 22 stone ( 140kg ) said it is impossible to meet the nhs criteria to have three stone ( 20kg ) of excess skin removed .
jeff huggins said he was told he does not meet the body mass index ( bmi ) yardstick for surgery .
the 45-year-old from morecambe said the weight of his spare skin means he can not meet the bmi test .
nhs lancashire north clinical commissioning group ( lnccg ) said it could not comment on individual cases .

documents.title: businessman 'absolutely gutted ' after sweet shop fire
text: a businessman said he was `` absolutely gutted '' after his sweet shop and building business was set alight in a suspected arson attack .
author: Lancashire Telegraph
Lancashire Telegraph

documents.title: latest headlines for lancashire
text: latest headlines for lancashire

documents.title: campaign for recruitment of more foster carers
text: a recruitment campaign has been launched in blackpool to increase the number of foster carers in blackpool .
more than 700 carers are currently needed in the resort - with around 9,000 across the north west .
blackpool council cabinet secretary graham cain says a variety of foster parents are needed .

documents.title: judge lifts banning order so young dad can attend daughter 's christening
text: a young dad , who kicked in his ex-partner 's door and was said to have threatened to kill her and smash her face in , has had a restraining order lifted so he can attend their daughter 's christening .
author: Burnley Express
Burnley Express

documents.title: cricket : win vital for lancashire progression , says coach giles
text: lancashire are one of three teams that could still be relegated from the first division of cricket 's county championship .
the red rose go into their final game of the season at warwickshire , with their opponents and hampshire also in danger of the drop .
lancashire head coach ashley giles is aware of the importance of staying in division one .
you can listen to commentary on 855 and 1557mw , and online .

documents.title: proportion of smokers in blackpool second highest in england
text: figures released by public health england ( phe ) show blackpool has the second highest proportion of smokers in the country .
more than 25 adults in every 100 in the resort are shown to be current smokers .
nationally , smoking rates in england have fallen to the lowest on record , phe has said .
in 2015 , 16.9 % of adults described themselves as smokers , compared with 19.3 % in 2012 .

documents.title: latest headlines for lancashire
text: latest headlines for lancashire

documents.title: firefighters tackle blaze at royal blackburn hospital
text: firefighters tackled a small blaze at the royal blackburn hospital last night .
it had broken out in the hillview building which is currently undergoing renovation .
they were called out about 22:15 and remained on site until midnight .
no-one was hurt in the blaze .

documents.title: cricket : crucial clash in lancashire 's final game
text: lancashire go into their final game of the season at warwickshire still needing 11 points to be certain of avoiding the drop .
the red rose travel to edgbaston as one of three teams who could still go down , with their hosts and hampshire also involved in the relegation scrap .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: chorley mayor , 83 , set for charity sky dive
text: chorley 's 83-year-old mayor is preparing to throw herself out of a plane from 10,000ft .
doreen dickinson is set to take part in a sky dive to raise money for the alzheimer 's society .
she told bbc radio lancashire that everybody is still shocked by her daredevil exploits .

documents.title: football : brown close to joining blackburn
text: former england defender wes brown is in advanced talks to join championship side blackburn , says boss owen coyle .
the 36-year-old ex-manchester united player was released by sunderland in june after a five-year spell .
brown injured his calf during pre-season with rovers , but has proved his fitness with the club 's under-23s .
as soon as i get the green light from the owners that i can get that over the line , i 'll pursue it vigorously
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: council starts measures to protect homes from future flooding
text: improvement works are being carried out in west lancashire to help protect council tenants whose homes were recently flooded .
during the last year , 41 properties fell victim to flooding because of heavy rainfall and the authority says it is keen to do all it can to limit any future damage .
surveys are well under way to establish the most suitable flood alleviation measures .

documents.title: fears over future of historic cricket club near chorley
text: a lancashire cricket club 's future is under threat because of dwindling numbers .
white cop in 1875 , play at a ground which has been voted as the most in england .
a number of committee members at the club near chorley are retiring following the last game of the season .
author: Paul O'Gorman
Reporter, BBC Radio Lancashire

documents.title: travel : tyre debris blocks one lane of m6
text: one lane is closed on the northbound m6 between junction 35 , carnforth , and junction 36 , kirkby lonsdale , because of tyre debris on the road .
more from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : early mist and fog clearing
text: a chilly start in some rural spots with patches of mist and fog .
this will gradually clear to leave a fine morning with some good spells of sunshine .
it will turn a little cloudier through the afternoon .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's coverage
text: welcome to lancashire live .
we 're here until 16:00 with the latest local news , sport , travel and weather updates from across the county .
you can get in touch with all your photographs and snippets of news by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jon Lowe
Reporter, BBC News Online
